item.title: A whale acquired an additional 2.94 million VIRTUAL tokens at an average price of $1.28, totaling over $3.7 million in value.
item.description: On August 25th, as monitored by OnchainLens, a whale utilized 785 ETH (valued at $3.76 million) to purchase 2.94 million VIRTUAL at a price of $1.28.Address: 0x4322fd98f95a219d2aae2bba6664e3574b4c3708.

item.title: Citi expects the 10-year US Treasury bond yield to reach 4.10% by the end of the year
item.description: August 25th: Jason Williams, a strategist at Citigroup, stated in a report that Citigroup has made some minor updates to its year-end yield level forecast for US Treasuries. Nevertheless, the institution remains confident in its long-standing forecast for the 10-year bond yield.He pointed out that the institution still anticipates that the 10-year US Treasury bond yield will reach 4.10% by the end of the year, which is in line with its forecast since last year. However, Citigroup has moderately adjusted other benchmarks in order to better align with its view of a steeper yield curve and lower policy rate expectations for 2026. Citigroup's new base forecasts for the two-year US Treasury bond yield are 3.50%; the five-year bond yield is 3.65%, and the 30-year bond yield is 4.70%. (FXStreet)

item.title: Former Fed Vice Chair: Fed Expected to Cautiously Lower Policy Rate
item.description: On August 25th, Richard Clarida, Pimco's global economic advisor and former vice chairman of the Fed, stated in a report that the Fed appears to be prepared to cut policy rates soon but will do so cautiously.Powell's highly anticipated speech at last week's Jackson Hole annual symposium did not let the market down. The launch of the Fed's revised monetary policy framework did not surprise Fed watchers. In the long run, the Fed reaffirmed its commitment to its dual mandate while making only minor clarifications to its monetary policy framework. (IG)

item.title: Binance will list BIOUSDC Perpetual Futures Contract
item.description: On August 25th, Binance is going to list the BIOUSDC perpetual contract.

item.title: A certain Bitcoin ancient whale sold 22,769 BTC, increased their ETH holdings to 472,900 ETH, and opened a long position for 135,200 ETH.
item.description: On August 25th, according to the monitoring of Lookonchain, the Bitcoin ancient whale, who once received a one-time 7-year-ago 100,784 BTC (valued at 6.42 billion USD at that time and now worth 11.4 billion USD), is frantically selling BTC and switching to ETH.In the past 5 days, they have deposited approximately 22,769 BTC (2.59 billion USD) to Hyperliquid for sale and then bought 472,920 ETH (2.2 billion USD) in the spot market and opened a long position of 135,265 ETH (570 million USD).Main Bitcoin Wallet Addresses:19D5J8c59P2bAkWKvxSYw8scD3KUNWoZ1C156osMUVhrLDWjRStBYe2VEW2cDy7xWrc8bc1qrmq0zl4lj85r4v2xusdelhx5mme45zsks4c29v17MWdxfjPYP2PYhdy885QtihfbW181r1rn12XqeqZRVkBDgmPLVY4ZC6Y4ruUUEug8Fx1E2JG2cZNkVdpdHQJ54MrpgoD28HHnZRpQMain Ethereum Wallet Addresses:0xac584D0BEaEE822321A1aCA4217B23F6E13BC7f70xAD75bbA280374bb7E65305053d1162bCBE911f8C0x927C49354844E835CfD469c0DCb063C560e7B3AA0xe862781010DdD3D9d011497D0B05f871dF98DE080x079433Ee99C5dF344Fa9836c8cc6F64E6c4859b60xCa2Dc8

item.title: OVERTAKE（TAKE） will be listed on Binance and MEXC on August 25th.
item.description: August 25th. According to official information, the game asset trading platform OVERTAKE's token TAKE is scheduled to officially commence its TGE on August 25th (in UTC+8 time zone). It will be listed on the following exchanges:· Binance: The IDO begins at 16:00, and the Alpha goes live at 18:00 (in UTC+8 time zone).· MEXC: Spot and contract trading starts at 20:00 (in UTC+8 time zone).The project team indicated that this multi-platform launch will boost liquidity and market visibility. Relevant trading and reward activities will also commence simultaneously.OVERTAKE is a P2P game asset market built on Sui, enabling players to trade in-game items, accounts, and tokens. It utilizes multi-signature smart contracts for custody to ensure low fees and immediate settlement.TAKE is employed for staking, governance, and unlocking platform-specific features. item.title: A whale has increased its long position on XPL. The current unrealized loss is nearly $360,000, with a liquidation price of $0.20816.
item.description: On August 25th, as monitored by OnchainLens, a whale once more deposited 2.99 million USDC into HyperLiquid and used a 3x leverage to increase its long position on XPL. The opening price was $0.57528, the liquidation price was $0.20816, and the current unrealized loss is approximately $360,000. The total position size has reached $8.52 million.This whale had deposited 4.99 million USDC into HyperLiquid 22 hours earlier and had opened a long XPL position with a 3x leverage.

item.title: ORDER surged above $0.20 yesterday, with a 25%+ gain in the past 7 days
item.description: On August 25th, based on HTX market data, Orderly (ORDER) witnessed a significant increase yesterday. It briefly exceeded $0.2 and is now in a retracement to $0.1770. It has witnessed a 3.38% increase in the past 24 hours and a surge of more than 25% in the past 7 days. The current market capitalization is $50.16 million.

item.title: Bitcoin Deposit Trend Continues, with CEX Net Inflow of 7,316.90 BTC in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On August 25th, based on Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the total net inflow of BTC on CEX was 7,316.90 BTC. The top three CEX exchanges in terms of inflow volume are as follows:- Binance had a net inflow of 4,072.23 BTC.- Coinbase Pro had a net inflow of 2,111.21 BTC.- Bitfinex had a net inflow of 896.61 BTC.In addition, OKX had a net outflow of 872.60 BTC and ranked first on the outflow list.

item.title: 「Big Bro Buddy」 went long 25x with 15,600 ETH and 40x with 175 BTC.
item.description: On August 25th, based on on-chain data, "Brother Ma Ji" Huang Licheng took a long position of 25 times on 15,600 ETH and 40 times on 175 BTC on the Hyperliquid platform, with a total position value of 93 million US dollars.The liquidation price for the Ethereum long position was $4696.96, and the liquidation price was $2075.7.The liquidation price for the Bitcoin long position was $113,714.4.
